retailer.title: Reseller Management
retailer.subtitle: View cashback and withdrawals
retailer.description: You are a reseller and can earn cashback from paid orders of invited users
retailer.rulesShortDescription: Learn how to earn cashback rewards
retailer.inviteCodeHint: Share this invite code or link, invite friends to register and purchase membership to earn cashback rewards
retailer.becomeRetailerTitle: Become a Reseller, Earn Promotion Income
retailer.becomeRetailerDesc: Earn cashback commissions when invited users make payments, easily achieve passive income

retailerStats.title: Reseller Performance
retailerStats.subtitle: View your promotion earnings
retailerStats.usersNeeded: Need {{count}} more paid users to upgrade
retailerStats.contentProofNeeded: Content creation proof required for upgrade

retailerRule.freezePeriod: Freeze Period: Cashback needs to be frozen for 30 days before withdrawal (to prevent refund risk)
retailerRule.settlementCycle: Settlement Cycle: Cashback is credited to wallet in real-time, automatically becomes withdrawable after freeze period
retailerRule.refundDeduction: Refund Processing: If user requests refund, corresponding cashback will be deducted from your wallet
retailerRule.withdrawalFee: Withdrawal Fee: Borne by reseller (specific fees depend on payment channel, generally 3-5% of withdrawal amount)
retailerRule.withdrawalTime: Processing Time: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 14 days
retailerRule.withdrawalAccount: Withdrawal Account: Need to add and verify payment address in 'Wallet Management' first
retailerRule.ruleModification: Platform reserves the right to modify reseller rules at any time, modified rules take effect immediately after announcement
retailerRule.disputeResolution: For any questions or disputes about reseller rules, please contact customer service promptly
retailerRule.finalInterpretation: Platform has final interpretation rights for these rules
retailerRule.agreement: Continued use of reseller function indicates you have read and agree to all above terms.
